indexOfIgnoreCase

public static int indexOfIgnoreCase(String str,
                                    String substr)
get the index of string on other string ignoring case.

Parameters:
str - string.
substr - string to search.
Returns:
index of substr on str ignoring case. If the substr not found in str -1 is returned.
